query:
SELECT qp.topicId, COUNT(*) as total, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'correct' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN topics t ON qp.topicId = t.id
WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND t.courseId = 30002
GROUP BY qp.topicId
ORDER BY qp.topicId;

  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'correct' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN topics t ON qp.topicId = t.id
WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND t.courseId = 30002
GROUP BY qp.topicId
